options.name: --backup
tip: make a backup of each existing destination file

options.name: -b
options.tip: like --backup but does not accept an argument

options.name: -i
options.tip: prompt whether to remove existing destination files

options.name: -n
options.tip: treat LINK_NAME as a normal file if it is a symbolic link to a directory

options.name: -L
options.tip: follow TARGETs that are symbolic links

options.name: -P
options.tip: make hard links directly to symbolic links

options.name: -s
options.tip: make symbolic links instead of hard links

options.name: -t
tip: specify the DIRECTORY in which to create the links

options.name: -T
options.tip: treat LINK_NAME as a normal file always

options.name: -r
options.tip: create symbolic links relative to link location

options.name: -v
options.tip: print name of each linked file
